name: Forest Adventure (Spyros Kyriazos)
description:
Exploration game created for Yogscast Game Jam 2020 in less than 48 hours with the theme "Surprise".

  • Unzip and run the .exe file
  • WASD, Spacebar and Mouse to move
  • Esc or Backspace to quit
  • Page up, Page down to change graphics quality

Explore the landscape, find and activate all the lanterns and go to the cabin.

There is not much to do in the game since I did not have enough time to finish it. In any case have fun and good luck with the game jam.

  • Cabin model by: stylisables
  • Christmas music by: Dee Yan-Key
  • All other assets from the epic store and megascans
  • Created with the Unreal Engine
